propel.core.functional.projections

Class Strings

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.functional.projections.Strings

  • public final class Strings
extends java.lang.Object
    Some common, re-usable projections for string manipulation

                         int _startIndex,
                         int _length)

        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - The index or length is out of range

      • substringNullCoalescing

        public static java.lang.String substringNullCoalescing(java.lang.String value,
                                       int _startIndex,
                                       int _length)
        Returns a sub-string of the given string, using a start index and a length from start. If a null string is encountered, or and index/length is out of range, then an empty string is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - The index or length is out of range

      • substringSafe

        public static java.lang.String substringSafe(java.lang.String value,
                             int _startIndex,
                             int _length,
                             java.lang.String _defaultValue)
        Returns a sub-string of the given string, using a start index and a length from start. If a null string is encountered, or and index/length is out of range, then the given default string is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - The index or length is out of range
